title: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, any item cannot be selected at the first time.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select an item from the outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.
EB: Upon the second attempt to select the label item, it can be selected successfully.
SR:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select an item from the outline view. Observe that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.
3. Retry selecting the label item. Observe that it can now be selected successfully.
